name: coderabbit-postgres
title: CodeRabbit with PostgreSQL
author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with PostgreSQL. Works with Neon, Vercel Postgres, Railway, AWS RDS, etc.
docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Run the SQL schema from storage-postgres.ts.
